column2: PBM EnvisionRx chooses Gilead hepatitis C drugs for its formulary Jan 26 Pharmacy benefits manager EnvisionRx said on Monday it reached an agreement to provide its customers with Gilead Sciences Inc's hepatitis C drugs on an exclusive basis
column3: the latest Gilead victory in a market share battle with AbbVie over their new treatments for the liver destroying virus.

column2: American Airlines Group canceling flights from major northeast hubs Jan 26 American Airlines Group has canceled all late afternoon and evening flights scheduled for Monday from the New York area
column3: Philadelphia and Boston as a major winter storm bears down on the northeast
column4: spokeswoman Andrea Huguely said.

column2: Regeneron/Sanofi cholesterol drug gets FDA priority review Jan 26 Regeneron Pharmaceuticals on Monday said U.S. health regulators accepted its application to review a potent  cholesterol drug on a priority basis
column3: potentially giving it the upper hand in a fierce race with Amgen  to bring a new medicine from the promising class to market.

column2: Samsung Elec to be main chip supplier for next iPhone-S.Korea paper SEOUL
column3: Jan 26 South Korea's Samsung Electronics Co Ltd will be the main supplier of processors powering Apple Inc's next iPhone
column4: Maeil Business Newspaper reported on Monday
column5: citing unidentified sources in the semiconductor industry.

column2: COLUMN-North Dakota oil rigs drop points to U.S. output decline after May: Kemp LONDON
column3: Jan 26 The decline in oil drilling that has occurred so far across the United States is probably enough to ensure U.S. production peaks by April or May
column4: though that might not be evident until June or July given delays in publishing production records.

column2: UPDATE 1-U.S. govt unveils goal to move Medicare away from fee-for-service WASHINGTON
column3: Jan 26 The Obama administration on Monday unveiled an ambitious plan to control health costs by moving the $2.9 trillion U.S. health systems away from costly fee-for-service medicine
column4: beginning with the Medicare program for the elderly and disabled.
